医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
人类跳蚤被发现是鼠疫爆发的罪魁祸首鼠疫最常见的可能与 1300 年代欧洲毁灭性的大流行病“黑死病”有关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Human-fleas-found-to-be-a-culprit-in-plague-outbreaks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Human-fleas-found-to-be-a-culprit-in-plague-outbreaks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25ce801f-c149-4581-94c8-52f7b2d6f88a Fri, 21 Jun 2024 10:07:21 -0400 Human fleas found to be a culprit in plague outbreaks
研究将肠道健康与复原力个体的大脑功能联系起来加州大学洛杉矶分校健康中心的一项新研究发现，适应力强的人在大脑区域表现出与认知和情绪调节改善相关的神经活动，并且更专注，更善于描述自己的感受。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Study-links-gut-health-and-brain-function-in-resilient-individuals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Study-links-gut-health-and-brain-function-in-resilient-individuals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2c1d39d-8049-4271-998d-46c77751ffe3 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 09:54:40 -0400 Study links gut health and brain function in resilient individuals
醉茄内酯的人工变体对白血病细胞具有高度特异性作用茄属植物产生多种具有治疗潜力的化合物。 CeMM 的研究人员现已发现一种受醉茄内酯类启发的人工变体，该变体对白血病细胞具有高度特异性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Artificial-variants-of-Withanolides-act-highly-specially-against-leukemia-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Artificial-variants-of-Withanolides-act-highly-specially-against-leukemia-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=84f868d3-6469-49e9-93cd-ed465d75d8bb Fri, 21 Jun 2024 09:50:06 -0400 Artificial variants of Withanolides act highly specifically against leukemia cells

在限制热量饮食的情况下，坚果可以促进减肥和血糖控制吗？研究人员比较了含坚果或不含坚果的能量限制（ER）饮食模式对身体成分、体重和血糖管理的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Can-nuts-boost-weight-loss-and-blood-sugar-control-on-a-calorie-restricted-diet.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240621/Can-nuts-boost-weight-loss-and-blood-sugar-control-on-a-calorie-restricted-diet.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ccdb8dd7-a807-46b9-9a1a-2a73a9692e67 Fri, 21 Jun 2024 08:40:00 -0400 Can nuts boost weight loss and blood sugar control on a calorie-restricted diet?
